metadata.description: Crozonia is an underwater civilization at war with Atlantis! Poseidon's Trident has been stolen from Crozonia, leaving the city vulnerable to an Atlantean attack. A New York City surface dweller, Matt Stark has been brought in to witness this war by Crozonia's mermaid princess, Acaste. The fate of the underwater world is at stake!
metadata.name: Crozonia
